You ok?
af838654d1aa5967:
◆Mattel
I'm fine, yes! I just couldn't sit idly
by as the Great Hero does his best
to save the kingdom!
9e1888acf95b722e:
◆Moe
Ho-hold your horses miss... When
you say "Great Hero"... You don't
mean...
ab85848ac17d5d6b:
◆Mattel
I'm referring to Mr. Starfy, of course!
His heroic deeds are known far and
wide throughout the Amiy Kingdom!
bc889893e06df43d:
◆Moe
Uh... Listen, miss... You can't believe
every rumor ya hear...
be84848996706f3f:
◆Moe

he learned up 'til now...
8f869053c73c673c:
◆Mattel

is a hero, after all!
ab069439e8c26f79:
◆Starly

hero!
ae818554d82d727f:
◆Starly

some treasure!
9f08c00733e83efb:
◆Moe
Wha-!? Are you outta your mind!?
ae868859e096777a:
◆Starly

ab828c91d62e726f:
◆Starly

kid, she'd be devastated!
af948c29d066f26b:
◆Moe

bb809418ccb7697d:
◆Moe

piece of cake for you, right?

◆Starly

◆Starly

b706c8889967363f:
◆Starly

Master the Glide Ability and nab the

b64698a7635a6635:
◆Starly

grab that treasure!
af0c8090b16d6ff3:
◆Moe

af888c92d06df13e:
◆Moe
Hello, cute ladies of the world!

ab90940cf867536f:
◆Moe
I, the Great and Powerful Moe,
will now begin my lecture on
navigating the City Screen!
b70c9898d8696737:
◆Moe
Make sure to pay close attention. And
for our smart friends out there who
already know this stuff...
af988444d82b7a6f:
◆Moe
Press the Start Button to skip the
lecture and jump right into the game.
As for everyone else, listen up!
af9880bcd043db6d:
◆Moe
First off, if you see an "!", it means
that something's really important.
Make sure not to overlook it, ok?
be8891a1e03ece37:
◆Moe
Use the bottom screen to touch
the icon with an "!" over it! Press the
ⓑ Button when you're done.
ae8098b4946bf37c:
◆Moe
You followed my directions exactly!
You're a natural!
9f888098c8377d77:
◆Moe
This is a Character Icon. Touch one
or use the D-Pad to move the cursor
to them and press Ⓐ...
a61c990c60f376fc:
◆Moe
And then you can talk to these guys.
ad009ee0e01f717f:
◆Moe
You see the "!" over the Character
Icon, right?
bf908489c176786f:
◆Moe
Whenever you see that, it means
they've got something really
important to say.
af8894a2ca3d6a6b:
◆Moe
For example, if you do a favor for
these guys, they might thank ya by
givin' you some treasure...
9f009c92f06d633f:
◆Moe
Or they might give you some helpful
hints for your adventure.
ab9085389863fa6f:
◆Moe
Either way, make sure to talk to
anyone with an "!" over their head!
af609bd46a97d00d:
This Ability'll let ya easily reach places
a regular jump couldn't! Make sure you
remember this, Big Bro!

                  : Slowmotion                     : Back

Spin into the right shapes.

b961c79cc89cd632: It's the Repair Kit needed to fix Old Man Lobber's bonsai tree.
aa5acd63d08595e9: Let's take the Shell to Herman in the city. If you use the Warp Jizou you can warp near the exit!

8a63d395e58cee18: Master the Glide ability and go get the treasure! Don't disappoint Mattel!
a42cdf96e1c970f0: Let's show the treasure to Mattel in the city. I'm sure they'll be happy!

◆Moe

◆Moe

bb088c96b749697a:
◆Moe

◆Moe

◆Moe

af889434e836d43f:

bd868408cb34f773:

ac65d448e390fbd8: Chase Konk and attack! If you get stuck, try the Glide ability.

◆Moe

bf0cc80cc43bf837:
◆Moe
That spinning idiot's about to be in a world of pain!
af80841cd325ed7b:
◆Moe

ab0c9411c47af37d:

ac00961ec837f76d:

bf01989ce01b673d:

◆? ? ?
Well, hello there! You're Starfy, the Prince of Pufftop, aren't you? Did you work up a good sweat?
b788985cc9a1637e:
◆Moe
Wha-!? Another bad guy!? Who the heck are you, and where's the fairy!?
b78090494eb6677d:
◆Lovewizmi
Hah hah hah! What a funny joke! I am Lovewizmi, and I AM the fariy of the Spring of Love!
bb019024ccb36f3f:
◆Lovewizmi
Don't be so shy, Shy Boy! I'll take the three of you right to the Tree of Beginnings!
bd019892866d6d3f:
◆Lovewizmi
Distant cities are just a hop, skip, and a warp away with the Spring of Love!
bf891013876ccc3f:
◆Lovewizmi
And. What's. More~! I'll let you go through the Love Road! My treat!
9f80882466d9e73f:
◆Starly
Love road? Sounds like somethin' that'd give ya heartburn... What is it?
b9908187956e5e6d:
◆Lovewizmi
Love Roads are pearl-filled paths that link together Springs of Love found in Cities.
bf0c9898e027e739:
◆Moe
Did you say pearls!? Hurry up and take us there!
bb03908dc9136f7c:
◆Lovewizmi
We've got an impatient boy on our hands! But before I take you there, I have to tell you some things.
bb09809116ce7bbb:
◆Lovewizmi
You'll be using the stylus to travel across the Love Road!
bf0191a0e21f6e6e:
◆Lovewizmi
Tap the Bottom Screen to place a Love Pointer! Do that, and you'll start moving towards it!
bb1895898d664a3f:
◆Lovewizmi
You only have a certain amount of them though, so use them wisely!
ad01901b97c76d2f:
◆Lovewizmi
Make sure to keep track of how many Love Pointers you have left as you go through the Love Road!
bd9080139b646d7f:
◆Lovewizmi
I'll turn any Love Pointers you have into pearls when you reach the goal! My~ treat!
bf019006e3d86f3e:
◆Lovewizmi
You can see how many Love Pointers you have left in the bottom-left side of the screen!
ab9190589e276f6a:
◆Lovewizmi
Oh, I almost forgot! If you hit any spikes or get squished between the walls, it's the end for you! Be careful!
978c443199e6db33:
